overview: Jesse Chambers is the Director of Sales Operations & Monetization for AOL Tech, including TechCrunch, Engadget, TUAW and Joystiq. Prior to joining the TechCrunch Team, Jesse worked in various roles within AOL’s Sales and Operations teams, respectively, including as Account Management Director for the Tech / Telecom vertical on the West Coast. Previously, he started and led the Inside Sales team at StubHub.com prior to its acquisition by eBay in 2007. He has lived in San Francisco for more than a decade, but will forever consider himself a proud New Yorker.
